attributes.action: support the carbon saving measures as set out in the Energy Efficiency and Microgeneration Bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Energy Efficiency and Microgeneration Bill sets out a number of measures to reduce carbon dioxide emissions and promote energy efficiency.

The most important parts of the bill cover the energy efficiency aspects of housing. A quarter of all UK carbon dioxide emissions come from the housing sector. The provisions in this bill have the potential to significantly reduce these emissions.

We urge the government to adopt the measures of this bill.

government_responses.details:
